entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 13 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 6:23 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
